name: Hotel Novotel Bourges

reviews.text: The hotel is not easy to find but once we were there, we found it a very pleasant place and perfect for an overnight stay on the way to Normandy, about half-way from Switzerland. We had specially asked for a non-smoking room but were given a smoking room. Luckily, we had arrived early in the booked-out hotel and with the help of friendly reception staff, this was quickly remedied. The air-conditioned room was comfortable, the dinner at the nice restaurant good value for money and the breakfast, as always at Novotels, was a treat. There is a swimming-pool in the nice garden. Would definitely use this hotel for another overnight stay but not for more than one day.
reviews.title: A perfect overnight stay
Does what it says on the tin
reviews.text: Arrived after a long journey up from the south, 5 mins off the autoroute and straight into an atypical clutch of stayover hotels - F1, Etap, 'MisterBed' and the Novotel - most owned by Accor anyway. Surprising lack of french speakers at Reception but having got my 'nous avons une reservation' speech off pat, no worries. We had two interconnecting rooms which they had allocated following an internet booking request, all very clean, quiet and ideal after a tiring day. Secure parking, nice pool, clean and welcoming, free internet facility by reception (used to book the next night in a Novotel...!)...can't ask for much more. At the end of the day, a Novotel is about being either a convenient base or an over night stay - it's not about views of grazing wildebeest nor honeymoons. This one does it exactement!

A friend and I stayed here on the weekend of the French Grand Prix. As there are no hotels in or around Magny Cours, everyone has to endure the hour long journey to and from Bourges. We arrived on the Friday evening hot, sticky and tired from a day in the scorching heat of Magny Cours.
reviews.title: Could Not Fault It

reviews.text: We were warmly welcomed by the reception staff. The mere mention of the swimming pool looking inviting and two fluffy swimming towels were produced from under the reception desk.
reviews.title: Ideal for what it is

reviews.text: We booked our evening meal on the terrace, and after freshening up with a swim and a shower we had an excellent meal as the sun went down.
reviews.title: A Very low budget hotel.

likes.liked: — There was an attempt to serve us breakfast.
likes.disliked: — It was not first class hotel as it was advertised and it was too far from Paris and nothing to do there.

reviews.text: Stopped over one night on the way back from Spain. The restaurant manager was incredibily rude. We had to ask 3 times for bread which comes as standard , when we asked for a well done steak he turned up his nose and said we would have to wait half an hour so we might aswell not bother! This was the 5th Novotel we had used in France and sadly after 4 previous stays at different Novotels around France which were all brilliant they really let them down.
reviews.title: Dreadful restaraunt service

reviews.text: We will definately be giving Novotel Bourges a wide berth if we return to that area !!
reviews.title: Loved the Novotel Bourges

likes.disliked: — The pool temperature was cold ... but this was a minor problem

description: The Novotel Bourges is located 7 km from the city centre, an ideal location for a business trip or holiday in the Berry region. This 3 star hotel offers 93 spacious, comfortable rooms as well as eight meeting rooms for your training days and seminars forup to 250 people. Relax and enjoy our bar and restaurant serving traditional cuisine as well as our outdoor swimming pool surrounded by a pleasant garden and terrace.
